description:
As Kenshin struggles to learn, Sijuro teaches him the most secret of his fighting techniques. And though Kenshin doesn`t want to kill, it`s inevitable if he is to beat Shishio. Meanwhile, Sanosuke is arrested during his search for Samurai X.
Source: crunchyroll
